alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 07 at 5:34PM MDT until June 07 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... North central Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 533 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles east of Blue Lake, or 30 miles northwest of Lamar, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to three inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kiowa and north central Bent Counties. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
